title: Service Notices | Academic Computing and Communications Center | University of Illinois at Chicago
text: 5/9/20, 7:17pm — The issues affecting calls to on-campus VoIP phones have been resolved and service is fully restored. ACCC VoIP and Telecom engineers worked with AT&T and Cisco support to identify and…

ACCC will be performing maintenance on the wordpress.cc.uic.edu server Thursday, May 21, from 7:30am to 9:30am. There is no expected downtime during this time period, but please be aware that a brief interruption…

ACCC will be performing maintenance on the UIC web site (uic.edu) Sunday, May 10, from 4:00pm to 9:00pm. This maintenance will include security enhancements, improve reliability,  and align better with the UIC brand.…

5/5/20, 7:48pm — Microsoft has resolved the infrastructure problem affecting Microsoft Teams presence (status). Service is fully restored and working as expected. For questions, please contact consult@uic.edu. 5/5/20, 4:26pm — Some users may…

Some users may have experienced issues accessing Request Tracker (RT) on Wednesday, April 29, between 2:00pm and 2:35pm. We have identified the problem and restored service. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions,…

4/28/20, 3:46pm — The Echo360 Lecture Capture issue has been resolved and service is operational. We apologize for the inconvenience. For questions, please contact: LTS@uic.edu 4/28/20, 3:09pm — Some users may be experiencing issues…
